election_record.label: Connecticut 1820 Lieutenant Governor

overview.note: Jonathan Ingersoll received 1 vote as Jonathan A. Ingersoll.
John Treadwell received 1 vote as Jonathan Treadwell.

sub_unit.name: Stratford
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 1 vote as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: Farmington
sub_unit.note: Nathaniel Smith received 2 votes as Nathan Smith.

sub_unit.name: Saybrook
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Saybrook.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. State Archives, Connecticut State Library, Hartford.
The Times, and Weekly Advertiser (Hartford, CT). April 25, 1820.
Connecticut Herald, and General Advertiser (New Haven, CT). May 2, 1820.
